description:
The North Star Army is joined by Ein, now a former bounty hunter, and the seasoned general Rihaku. They set out for the Imperial Capital. Rihaku speaks of Falco`s past. Falco, who held his own against Raoh, once sacrificed his own leg to save a town. Meanwhile, inside the Imperial Capital, General Shoki of the Red Light sparks a revolt against Jakoh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Falco, le général du Gento ! L`ombre de Raoul...
Falco, the Brave General of the Source Star! There Lies the Shadow of Raoh...
Gento no Moushou Falco! Soko ni wa Raoh no Kage ga...
元斗の猛将ファルコ! そこにはラオウの影が...
